channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AZ

item.title: Report X-2024010832
item.description:
Report X-2024010832

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-01T15:11:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-05
  • City: YUMA
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Ops manager was sending the hazmat on the hytrol up the belt, the plastic pail fell from it and it caused a puncture. After seeing this QA personnel grabbed a hazmat tote and cleaned up the area. DescribePack: Plastic pail was punctured at the bottom upon falling. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Pail was put in a hazmat tote and moved from the area to the repack table.
